address: Address: 50 Cumberland Street South (Inside The Casino)
text:
CANADIAN BREAKFAST $12
Two eggs, hashbrowns and choice of bacon,
sausage or ham. Served with toast.
Breakfast ALL DAY
Salads & Starters
MAXBET $17
Three eggs, three strips of bacon, three
sausages, two slices of ham and triangle
hashbrowns. Served with toast.
BELGIAN WAFFLES $10
Three deliciously stacked Belgian waffles.
Served with butter and maple syrup.
TACO SALAD $15
Iceberg lettuce topped with taco meat, diced
tomatoes, green onions, black olives & shredded
cheese. Served with sour cream & salsa.
MEDITERRANEAN GREEK SALAD $16
Romaine lettuce topped with red peppers,
red onions, cucumbers, tomatoes, black olives
and feta cheese.
GARDEN SALAD LG $13 SM $8
CAESAR SALAD LG $14 SM $8
MINI FISH TACOS $13
Two Fish Tacos - fried battered Cod dressed
with tartar and coleslaw.
CRISPY CAULIFLOWER BITES $14
Crispy breaded cauliflower tossed in your
choice of sauce.
FLATBREAD PIZZA $17
Choose from Canadian, Pepperoni or Veggie.
BONELESS BITES $16
Crispy breaded chicken bites tossed in your
favourite sauce.
CHICKEN WINGS $16
A pound of crispy breaded wings served with
your favourite sauce, either on the side or tossed.
PORK RIBLETS $15
Lightly dusted bone-in pork bites. Served with
garlic dill aioli and a lemon wedge.
COCONUT SHRIMP $14
Coconut battered shrimp served with sweet and
spicy Thai sauce.
HAM & CHEESE OMELET $14
Three egg omelette stuffed with cheddar
cheese and ham. Served with hashbrowns
and your choice of toast.
STEAK'N EGGS $21
6oz striploin, two eggs, hashbrowns and toast.
*Steak served medium or well*
GARLIC BREAD $6 JALAPENO POPPERS $13
CLASSIC BUFFALO CHICKEN DIP
& PITA BITES
$14
SOUP OF THE DAY $8
Ask your server about today's soup.
QUESADILLA $14.50
Flour tortilla stuffed with red peppers,
mushrooms, onions and cheese.
Add grilled chicken $5.50
SUBJECT TO APPLICABLE TAXES. AVAILABLE WHILE QUANTITIES LAST.
SOME ITEMS MAY CONTAIN NUTS OR ALLERGENS.
FRENCH TOAST $12
Served with your choice of bacon, sausage
or ham.
Served daily only until 4pm!
Entrées
Desserts Sides & Extras
FEATURE CHEESECAKE $12
LEMON TORTE $10
VANILLA ICE CREAM $6
APPLE PIE $8
SAUSAGE & PEPPER PENNE $21
Chorizo sausage with sautéed red
pepper, onions and mushrooms on a
bed of penne tossed in marinara sauce.
LIVER & ONIONS $18.50
One piece of sautéed beef liver topped with
fried onions. Best served with mashed potatoes.
Add an additional piece for $5.50
FISH & CHIPS $18
Two pieces of deep fried battered cod. Served
with French fries and coleslaw.
HALF CHICKEN DINNER $23
Baked chicken brushed with your favourite
sauce. Served best with rice and vegetables.
White meat only extra $2
QUARTER CHICKEN DINNER $18.50
*Available Thursday to Sunday after 4pm*
CHICKEN PARMIGIANA $21
Breaded chicken breast covered in marinara
sauce and cheese on top of your choice of
fettuccine or penne.
SALMON DINNER $30
6oz Lemon Pepper Salmon Fillet served with
rice and vegetables.
SEAFOOD FETTUCCINE $24
Lobster sensation, Pollock and shrimp tossed in
Alfredo sauce. Served with garlic bread.
MEATLOAF DINNER $18.50
Homemade meatloaf served along side
mashed potatoes and vegetables.
BAKED POTATO / MASHED POTATO/ RICE PILAF $5
FRENCH FRIES / VEGETABLES $7
ONION RINGS $8
POUTINE $12
CHIPPERS WITH GARLIC AIOLI $10
GRAVY $2.50
SUBJECT TO APPLICABLE TAXES. AVAILABLE WHILE QUANTITIES LAST.
SOME ITEMS MAY CONTAIN NUTS OR ALLERGENS.
Baked Potato/Mashed/French Fries/Rice/Sub for Onion Rings,
Soup or Garden/Caesar Salad for $3.50
10oz STRIPLOIN STEAK $34
Tender Striploin grilled to perfection. Try it with
a baked potato and vegetables.
Add sautéed mushrooms or onions for $3.50
Add grilled shrimp for $7
FULL RACK BBQ RIBS $29
Slow roasted pork back ribs smothered in
choice of Honey garlic or BBQ sauce, served
with your choice of potato and corn.
Half Rack $20
**Available after 4PM**
PASTA & MEATBALLS $16
Penne or fettuccine noodles, marinara sauce
and meatballs.
CHICKEN FETTUCCINE $18
Grilled chicken breast on a bed of fettuccine
noodles and Alfredo sauce.
Sandwiches & Burgers
PHILLY CHEESE STEAK $18
Tender roast beef, Swiss cheese, sautéed
onions and red peppers served on a
pretzel hoagie.
CLASSIC FULLHOUSE CLUB $18.50
Chicken breast, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise,
bacon, tomato and lettuce on toasted white or
whole wheat bread.
SOUTHWEST CHICKEN $18.50
Crispy chicken cruncher, Monterey Jack, bacon,
jalapenos with a creamy southwest sauce.
CHICKEN CORDON BLEU $18.50
Breaded chicken, Swiss cheese, ham and mayo.
CBC WRAP $17
Chicken, bacon, cheddar cheese, lettuce,
tomato and mayo.
CHICKEN PARM SANDWICH $18.50
Breaded chicken smothered in tomato sauce
and cheese.
MEATLOAF SANDWICH $17
4oz of housemade meatloaf, fried onions and
beef gravy. Served between a grilled Kaiser.
CHICKEN FINGERS & FRIES $16
Four strips of crispy breaded chicken breast.
Served with fries and plum sauce.
TACO WRAP $17
Taco meat, tomato, lettuce, black olives,
cheese and green onion served in a flour
tortilla. Served with a side of salsa and
sour cream.
VEGGIE WRAP $17
This wrap is jam-packed with lettuce,
tomato, red onion, mushrooms, black
olives, peppers, and Feta cheese. Served
with an Italian dressing.
CHICKEN CAESAR WRAP $17
Chicken, bacon, Caesar salad neatly wrapped.
SUBJECT TO APPLICABLE TAXES. AVAILABLE WHILE QUANTITIES LAST.
SOME ITEMS MAY CONTAIN NUTS OR ALLERGENS.
Sandwiches & Burgers are served with a choice of one side:
French Fries/Home Fries/ Sub for Onion Rings, Soup or Garden/Caesar salad $3.50
REUBEN SANDWICH $18.50
Grilled rye bread stuffed with corned beef,
Swiss cheese, sauerkraut and thousand
island dressing.
CRISPY CHICKEN BURGER $18.50
Crispy chicken breast tossed in your
choice of mild, medium, buffalo or
honey garlic sauce.
MUSHROOM SWISS $18.50
6oz Burger loaded with sautéed mushrooms
and Swiss cheese.
TEXAS HOLD'EM $18.50
Juicy 6oz beef patty, Cheddar cheese, bacon
and BBQ sauce.
BLACKJACK $18.50
Grilled all beef burger patty, Monterey Jack,
sautéed mushrooms and garlic aioli.
DILL-ICIOUS BURGER $18.50
Delicious all beef patty, Swiss cheese, bacon,
pickles and a garlic dill sauce.
All Burgers are topped with lettuce,
tomato and onion.
Vegetarian option available.
CHANGE UP YOUR SIDE FOR AN
EXTRA $5
Poutine
Chippers & Garlic Aioli
STEAK SANDWICH $23
Grilled striploin, sautéed onions and
mushrooms on a panini. YUMMY!
*Steak served medium or well*
name: Getaway Restaurant (Inside The Casino)
